thread.title: Can't do NY without doing the Soho Grand -
thread.title_full: Can't do NY without doing the Soho Grand - Review of Soho Grand Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Peter M
title: Can't do NY without doing the Soho Grand -
text:
Awesome hotel. Stay nowhere else in NY. Fabulous location - funky decor - awesome bar. Doormen are a cut above. Friendly, knowledgeable and comforting. Can't recommend highly enough.
Been numerous times and Soho Grand is a home away from home. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
